description: Details required for Condition 17 (Sustainable Drainage Scheme) of planning permission 21/02051/FUL (Application under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 to vary Condition 2 (Approved Plans) of Planning Permission ref: 18/16123/FUL (Demolition of the former NHS Trust Site and erection of a three storey building with set back fourth floor providing 49 new homes, comprising 17 x 1 bed, 22 x 2 bed and 10 x 3 bed, proposed basement accommodating 30 car parking spaces, 84 cycle parking spaces and landscaping at ground floor) dated 28/09/2018. Variation to include changes to the technical design process.)
decision_conditions: Insufficient information has been submitted to be able to meet the requirements of, and successfully discharge, condition 17 of planning permission reference 21/02015/FUL.
